Strengths: High accuracy, global coverage, supports batch geocoding, integrates well with ArcGIS ecosystem, handles address parsing.
Weaknesses: Requires an API key and Esri subscription for full functionality; usage limits and potential costs; slower than local methods for large datasets.
Sources: Esri's ArcGIS Online services, Esri World Geocoding Service, custom geocoders via ArcGIS.

Strengths: Free and open-source, no API key required, works well for global locations, supports batch geocoding.
Weaknesses: Can be slower and less reliable for batch geocoding; coverage and accuracy vary by region; limited support for structured address input.
Sources: OpenStreetMap Nominatim API, other OSM-based geocoding services.

Strengths: Free, official US government data, highly accurate for US addresses, batch geocoding supported.
Weaknesses: US-only; requires an API key; formatting and coverage depend on Census Bureau data; occasional lag in data updates.
